markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iruxi Spirit Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2413) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors. Any unarmed attacks you acquire from iruxi heritages or ancestry feats gain the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune.
name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
